button_screen.heading: Verification completed, proceed to issue your Verified ID.
button_screen.sub_heading: Use Microsoft Authenticator to save your Verified ID. Click on Add Verified ID to open the app. Enter the pin code when prompted.

qr_screen.heading: Verification completed, proceed to issue your Verified ID.
qr_screen.list_item_1: Open the app and tap the scan QR code button icon to scan the QR code.
qr_screen.list_item_2: Enter the pin code in the app when prompted.
qr_screen.sub_heading: Scan the QR code with Microsoft Authenticator to save your Verified ID.

button_screen.heading: Access the portal with your existing Verified ID.
button_screen.sub_heading: Use the Microsoft Authenticator app to verify your identity. Once this step is complete, you will be granted access.

intro_screen.heading: Authenticate or create your new Verified ID.
intro_screen.list_item_1: Take a photo of your identity document.
intro_screen.list_item_2: Take a photo of your face.
intro_screen.sub_heading: You will be asked to verify your identity. This should only take a few minutes. You will be asked to:

qr_screen.heading: Access the portal with your existing Verified ID.
qr_screen.list_item_1: Open the Microsoft Authenticator app on your mobile device.
qr_screen.list_item_2: Open the Verified IDs tab and tap the QR code button in the top right corner to scan.
